content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings, Yi-Nuo Wang. While I appreciate your interest in the Magdeburg apartment, let us focus solely on discussing the rental price during our negotiation. To initiate, I propose a price of 1200 Euros per month.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is too expensive for me. I have seen similar apartments in the city center for 800 euros. I know the apartment is new and in a good location, but the price is too high.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my expectations for this prime location and newly built apartment exceed the 800 Euros you mentioned.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. Let's say 900 euros per month. That should cover the cost of the new apartment and its central location.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 900 Euros per month! TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
